'''Violet Court''' is a [[Domain]] located in [[Inazuma]]. Clearing this domain gives [[Character Talent Material]]s. Challenge domains with higher levels to get better rewards.

If the player destroys all of the clay pots on the island of this domain's entrance, a named [[Nobushi: Kikouban#Special|Nobushi: Kikouban]] will spawn. Upon his defeat, a [[Chests|Luxurious Chest]] will spawn as a reward.

==Ley Line Disorder==
Each level in this domain has the following Ley Line Disorder, respectively:
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!I - IV
|
*All characters in the party gain a 25% {{Color|Electro DMG Bonus}}
*Inside the challenge is Electro Crystalfruit, and Nascent Electro Pearls will emerge at intervals. After obtaining Nascent Electro Pearls, a character's Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst will unleash Falling Thunder upon hitting enemies, dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|}

===Notes===
* Two Electro Crystalfruits can be found on the left and right side of the arena, and will occasionally spawn Nascent Electro Pearls during the fight.
* The Pearls may sit atop the Crystalfruit; fly in a circle around the arena; or rise in the air. Pearls in the air require flying or climbing mechanics to reach, such as Albedo's [[Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma]].

===Damage===
{{See also|Level Scaling/Reaction#Level Multiplier}}
The {{Color|True Electro DMG}} dealt by the Falling Thunder is calculated as <math>65 \times \text{Level Multiplier}</math>. This DMG is unaffected by the target's [[DEF]], [[RES]], or [[DMG Reduction]].
